Subject: Re: Motormaster
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Motormaster strains himself to keep up to Astoblast, but is soon left in
the wake of the speed the larger sheep controls. As he drifts further and
further behind, he receives an interesting blip, of a ship. "Astroblast, go
on ahead, without me, I have another ship on my scanner, that I should
check out" and as he finishes his radio transmission, he veers off to the
right, soaring towards the earth again.
